parameters.name: Vtx
parameters.description: Vertex for which to get setback distance

parameters.name: EdgeVar
parameters.description: Array of edges at the specified vertex (see Remarks )

title: ISimpleFilletFeatureData2.GetSetbackVertexDistance
description: Gets the setback distance for the specified vertex on this simple fillet feature.
signature:
System.Object GetSetbackVertexDistance( 
   System.Object
Vtx
,
   out System.Object
EdgeVar
)

parameters.name: Vtx
parameters.description: Vertex for which to get setback distance

parameters.name: EdgeVar
parameters.description: Array of edges at the specified vertex (see Remarks )

returns: Array of setback distances at the specified vertex
remarks: There is a one-to-one correspondence between the members of the EdgeVar array and the members of the returned setback distance array.
